summary: WHILE MAKING RIGHT HAND TURNS  CONSUMER HEARD A CLICKING NOISE. TOOK VEHICLE TO TWO DIFFERENT DEALERSHIPS AT LEAST 6 TIMES. ONE DEALERSHIP  REPLACED THE CLOCK SPRING TWICE. THE OTHER DEALERSHIP REPLACED THE CLOCK SPRING ONCE. HOWEVER,  PROBLEM WAS NOT RESOLVED.  EACH TIME THE MECHANICS INDICATED THAT CLICKING NOISE PROBLEM COULD NOT BE HEARD OR LOCATED.  VEHICLE HAD BEEN TEST DRIVEN BY THE MECHANICS WITH  CONSUMER  IN VEHICLE.*AK
